newsitem.title: USA: Ocean Financial gets buyback approval.
newsitem.headline: Ocean Financial gets buyback approval.

text.p: Ocean Financial Corp, the holding company for Ocean Federal Savings Bank, said Tuesday it received approval from the Office of Thrift Supervision to repurchase, into treasury stock, up to 452,956 shares, or 5 percent, of its outstanding common stock.

The Repurchase Program was approved under a recent change in OTS policy regarding stock repurchases, which now limits stock repurchases in the first year following a mutual to stock conversion to no more than five percent of outstanding common stock.

The Repurchase Program is expected to start after April 28 and will expire July 2, the one-year anniversary of the Bank's conversion to stock form. All repurchases will be made in open market transactions, the company said.
